description: Pow Bar is a Hokkaido-based company that produces energy bars, initially created by a couple for outdoor enthusiasts. Recognizing a lack of awareness about power bars in Japan, they began educating consumers about healthier alternatives to ultra-processed convenience store snacks. Their philosophy emphasizes real ingredients and sustainability, using local products when possible. They aim to foster community engagement and promote healthier eating habits through their caf√© and educational initiatives.
name: Pow Bar
